## newSanitizer() function

Create a new Sanitizer with optional configuration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function newSanitizer(options?: SanitizerOptions): Sanitizer;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[SanitizerOptions](./runeutil.sanitizeroptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Sanitizer](./runeutil.sanitizer.md)

## Example


```ts
const sanitizer = newSanitizer({
  replaceNewLine: " ",  // Replace newlines with space
  replaceTab: "",       // Remove tabs
});

sanitizer.sanitize("hello\nworld"); // "hello world"
```
